title: VA New Wave (Pre Indie Electro) - Ghosts (Dutch Treat ^A162 HQ)
description:
Short time ago I run against the Rare Hits from the 80s vol 62. Good music from the Pre Indie period in which the electronic music was awakening. A bit under the surface. Recordings weren't that good but hÃƒÂ©, more than good enough. Volume 62, each containing an average 25 tracks. If I was a hit, I would drawn.

So I came to the rescue (did it once before with the Rare Albums series => Rock 80, not many people are lucky enough to be able to do that) and saved a few tracks (to let you feel how good the original series actually is). My aim is to make 5, 15 Track 1-hour New Wave Playlists (and probably end up with a little more). All HQ. This one is the second already....

With many thanks to the original creator (lot of work, especially vinyl) of the Rare Hits series, enjoy, its click save :)


Dutch Treat - ^A162 Ghosts (New Wave)
